robocode.control.testing

Class RobotTestBedAssert

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.junit.Assert
      • robocode.control.testing.RobotTestBedAssert

  • public class RobotTestBedAssert
extends Assert
    Provides some additional Assert methods for use in Robocode.
    Author:
    Philip Johnson (original), Pavel Savara (contributor)

      • assertNear

        public static void assertNear(double value1,
                              double value2)
        Asserts that the two values are "sufficiently close". Define sufficiently close using Utils.NEAR_DELTA.
        Parameters:
        value1 - First value.
        value2 - Second value.
